channel.title: All of a sudden, my flash drive needs to be formated
channel.description:
What. The. Fuck. A couple of minutes ago, I wanted to go play a game I have on my flash drive, but Vista says it's not formated. I can't defragment, I can't CHKDSK, I can't do anything except format it.
Is there a way to keep all the (important) files I had on it?

item.title: All of a sudden, my flash drive needs to be formated
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Gimme the name I’ll get you the crack

Also try the sandisk recovery tool for flash drives, worked on many things for me, even after format!

Read full topic
item.source: All of a sudden, my flash drive needs to be formated

Doesn’t hurt to try. And there are lots of free ones. Google bro.

item.title: All of a sudden, my flash drive needs to be formated
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Imonfire:

I never remove it. It’s always in my comp. In the last few months I think I removed it twice or so.

That’s bad, if it didn’t die of overheating, it probably died of static shock from the PC’s case.

Read full topic

item.description:

Read full topic
item.source: All of a sudden, my flash drive needs to be formated

item.title: All of a sudden, my flash drive needs to be formated
item.dc:creator: Grey_Acumen
item.description:
I occasionally have a similar problem happen with my SD cards. My suggestion is to try plugging your drive into a different USB port, or if that’s not possible, restart your PC and then try plugging it in again. If that doesn’t work, try it in a different PC. If you do get it to work, copy all the data from it and then do a full format before dropping all the data back into it.

And no, I’ve been using USB for years. I NEVER use the eject hardware safely and I’ve never have had any data lost as a result. All eject hardware safely does anyway is make sure that you’re not actively writing anything to the drive, but if you are, it’s not like it cancels anything, so if something hangs, you end up having to unplug it without using the safe eject anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: All of a sudden, my flash drive needs to be formated

item.title: All of a sudden, my flash drive needs to be formated

You’re going to have to download all of your porn again.
